channel.title: I need help with includes
channel.description: well i am decidng to try and attempt to learn to script, but i first i really wan tto learn how to change includes in a script because i really love some old scripts that work fine except for the randoms if anyone can explain or teach me it would really help

item.title: I need help with includes
item.dc:creator: @arr0w Arr0w
item.description:
@arr0w wrote:

you jsut do this

{.include SRL/SRL.Scar.} then you will be able to use the features that the include has.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with includes
item.dc:creator: @deathbyvirus deathbyvirus
item.description:
@deathbyvirus wrote:

if you wanted to make/edit other include though i would highly suggest learning just basic scar programming first, cuz you can get really confuzed otherwise

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with includes
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Well, the only include you should need is SRL. Just add

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

after your program line, and then if you want old scripts to work with randoms, just add this:

FindNormalRandoms;

To various places in the script. That should find most of the randoms. If you need more help, ask.

Read full topic
